GK19jagsudhu:3: utpātastāmasānāmupahatamahasāṃ cakṣuṣāṃ pakṣapātaḥ saṃghātaḥ ko 'pi dhāmnāmayamudayagiriprāntataḥ prādurāsīt // JSudh_1 //
GK19jagsudhu:4: padmadrohoddhurāṇāṃ dhavalitaharitāmaindavīnāṃ dyutīnāṃ darpaṃ drāgdrāvayanto vidaladaruṇimodrekadedīpyamānāḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:5: dūrādevāndhakārāndhitadharaṇaitaladyotane baddhadīkṣāste dainyadhvaṃsadakṣā mudamudayadinodveladusrā diśantu // JSudh_2 //
GK19jagsudhu:6: trātāmīvārtalakṣāḥ pratidinavihitānekagīrvāṇarakṣā bhaktānāṃ kalpavṛkṣāḥ sphuradanalagatasvarṇabhāsāṃ sadṛkṣāḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:7: lokakṣemāttadīkṣā nalinapariṣadāṃ dattasaubhāgyalākṣā durvṛttadhvaṃsadakṣā mama ravikiraṇāḥ santvaghānāṃ vipakṣāḥ // JSudh_3 //
GK19jagsudhu:9: viśliṣyatkokabālājvaraharaṇabhavatkīrtijālairjaṭālā vyomavyāptau viśālāstvayi dadhatu śivaṃ bhāsvato bhānumālāḥ // JSudh_4 //
GK19jagsudhu:10: nirbhidye kṣmāruhāṇāmatighanamudaraṃ yeṣu gotrāṃ gateṣu drādhiṣṭhasvarṇadaṇḍabhramabhṛtamanasaḥ saṃnidhitsanti pādān /
GK19jagsudhu:11: yaiḥ saṃbhinne dalāgrapracalahimakaṇe dāḍimībījabuddhyā cañcūcāñcalyamañcanti ca śukaśiśavasteṃ 'śavaḥ pāntu bhānoḥ // JSudh_5 //
GK19jagsudhu:12: ahni krīḍocitānāṃ sarasiruhalasanmandirāṇāṃ prabhāte prodghāṭya drākkapāṭānyatha kumudagṛhānmudrayanto vimuktān /
GK19jagsudhu:13: siñcantaḥ kiṃ ca bhūmītalamakhilamapi kṣuṇṇakāśmīranīraiḥ pāyāsuḥ śrīsaparyāviracanapaṭavaḥ padmabandhoḥ karā naḥ // JSudh_6 //
GK19jagsudhu:15: prauḍhaprāleyapuñjopari citasvadirāṅgārabhārā ivārātpārāvārātprayānto dinakarakiraṇā maṅgalaṃ naḥ kṛṣīran // JSudh_7 //
GK19jagsudhu:17: utsṛṣṭaṃ gosahasraṃ bahalakalakalaḥ śrūyate ca dvijānāṃ bhāgyairvṛndārakāṇāṃ harihayaharitā sūyate putraratnam // JSudh_8 //
GK19jagsudhu:18: yā sūte savabhūteṣvanudinamudaye cetanāyā vilāsānyāntī sāyaṃ nikāyaṃ jalanidhijaṭharaṃ saṃjarīharti sadyaḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:19: atyarthaṃ vardhayantī maṇigaṇasuṣamāsaṃpadaṃ ratnasānoḥ sā no bhānoḥ prabhā no nayanasaraṇito dūrato jātu yātu // JSudh_9 //
GK19jagsudhu:20: nīhārairnīrajānāṃ nibiḍatamatamorāśibhirlocanānāṃ śrautasmārtakriyāṇāmapi khalu niśayā nāśamālakṣya dūrāt /
GK19jagsudhu:21: sadyaḥ sindhoḥ sakāśādadhikatarajavenāgatā vāsavāśāmāśāpāśānaśeṣānapaharatutarāṃ tīkṣṇabhānoḥ prabhā naḥ // JSudh_10 //
GK19jagsudhu:22: śīte śokaṃ śaśāṅke kṛśatamarucitāmāśunāśaṃ niśāyāṃ dhikkāraṃ dhvāntavarge kumudapariṣadi prodgamaṃ dīnatāyāḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:23: pāṇḍityaṃ puṇḍarīkeṣvanudinamadhikāṃ kāntimāśāsu tanvannanvañcatyanvahaṃ dyāmuṣasi karuṇayā viśvavandyo vivasvān // JSudh_11 //
GK19jagsudhu:24: svāpaṃ svāpākulānāṃ gadamatha gadināmandhakāraṃ trilokyāḥ pāpaṃ pāpāvilānāṃ sapadi pariharannāgato vāsavāśām /
GK19jagsudhu:25: nityaprasthānalīlākupitakamalinīnarmanirmāṇakarmā viśvārtitrāṇadharmā gaganamaṇirasau pātu śarmāniśaṃ vaḥ // JSudh_12 //
GK19jagsudhu:26: antarnīraṃ nadīnāmanudinamudaye bimbitā ye samantādgīrvāṇādrerudañcanmaṇigaṇajaṭilāṃ medinīṃ darśayanti /
GK19jagsudhu:29: satrāsaṃ saprasādaṃ pariṇatakaruṇaṃ locanānyutkṣipanti sthemānaṃ sa priyāṇāṃ ghaṭayatu bhagavānpadminīvallabho vaḥ // JSudh_14 //
GK19jagsudhu:31: sāyaṃ prātaśca saṃdhyāñjalimavanisurāḥ saṃprayacchanti yasmai tasmai kasmaicidetanmama paramahaṃse devatāyai namo 'stu // JSudh_15 //
GK19jagsudhu:32: trāṇaṃ traiviṣṭapānāṃ taraṇamatha payastomatāmyattanūnāṃ nadyantānāmatarkyaṃ triguṇamayatayā yattrayāṇāṃ turīyam /
GK19jagsudhu:35: gāhaṃ gāhaṃ gṛhālīragatikagadināṃ gandhayanto gadārtiṃ glānigrāmaṃ grasantāṃ graharuciguravo gopatergovilāsāḥ // JSudh_17 //
GK19jagsudhu:36: jīvāturjāḍyajālādhikajanitarujāṃ taptajāmbūnadābhaṃ jaṅghālaṃ jāṅghikānāṃ jaladhijaṭharato jṛmbhamāṇaṃ jagatyām /
GK19jagsudhu:37: jīvādhānaṃ janānāṃ janakamatha ruco jīvajaivātṛkāderjyotirjājvalyamānaṃ jalajahitakṛto jāyatāṃ vo jayāya // JSudh_18 //
GK19jagsudhu:38: prātarnirgatya gobhiḥ saha ruciviṣaye saṃcarantyo 'hni tābhiḥ sākaṃ sāyaṃ nikāyaṃ prati punarapi yāḥ saṃprayātuṃ tvarante /
GK19jagsudhu:39: yāsāṃ divyaprabhāvastrijagadaghavanaśreṇidāhaikadāvaḥ kṣemaṃ tanvantu tā vaḥ śivamayavapuṣo vāsareśasya gāvaḥ // JSudh_19 //
GK19jagsudhu:40: vṛndairvṛndārakāṇāṃ danutanujanuṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ ca kṣapānte gandharvāṇāṃ dhurīṇaiḥ praṇatamahivaraiḥ kiṃnarairyannaraiśca /
GK19jagsudhu:41: vidyāṃ hṛdyāṃ nijebhyo vitaradavirataṃ dīptibhirdīpayaddyāmadyādādyāmavidyāmidamudayagirerudyadarkasya bimbam // JSudh_20 //
GK19jagsudhu:42: ā pāthojāsanāyuḥ kṣaṇalavaghaṭikādyātmakaṃ kālacakraṃ prāhuḥ pūrve purāṇāgamaviṣayavido yasya līlāvilāsam /
GK19jagsudhu:43: bhāvānāṃ ṣaḍvikārānatha khalu gatibhiryaśca nityaṃ prasūte sa prātaḥ pauruhūte parilasati harinmaṇḍale caṇḍabhānuḥ // JSudh_21 //
GK19jagsudhu:44: aṅgāni brāhmaṇānāmuṣasi himabharāsaṅgato bhaṅgurāṇi vyālakṣya drākprapātā ripujanitaruṣevāruṇā vāsavāśām /
GK19jagsudhu:45: dharmadhvaṃsoddhurāṇāmakhilamapi kulaṃ jakṣataḥ śobhitakṣmā yakṣmāṇaṃ me harantu tvaritamaghabhido bhānavaścaṇḍabhānoḥ // JSudh_22 //
GK19jagsudhu:46: viśrāntiṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sukhamatiśayitaṃ kāmināṃ sthāyilīlāmambhojānāṃ prabodhaṃ kumudapariṣadāṃ yaścikīrṣandayārdraḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:47: niryātyantaḥsamudraṃ sakalamapi nṛṇāṃ bhāramādhāya vahnāvahnāyāhnāmadhīśaḥ sa bhavatu bhavatāṃ bhūyase maṅgalāya // JSudh_23 //
GK19jagsudhu:48: drāgāhatya prabhāte rajanihimavataḥ kaumudīḥ kautukena prodyatprauḍhānukampāḥ punarapi khalu ye sāyamujjīvayanti /
GK19jagsudhu:49: āruṇye pallavānāmatha gurucaraṇāḥ śakragopāvalīnāṃ te yuṣmadbhāvalīnāṃ dinakarakiraṇāḥ klāntimunmūlayantu // JSudh_24 //
GK19jagsudhu:50: drāgadvaitaṃ vitanvaṃstribhuvanamabhitaḥ kauṅkumīnāṃ dyutīnāṃ nyakkurvanmāndyamudrāmatha rajanirujāṃ kokasīmantinīnām /
GK19jagsudhu:51: tandrāndhānāndhyasindhoriha vitatatarairuddadhānaṃ karāgraiḥ svāntadhvāntaṃ dhunītāmudayagiriśiraścumbi mārtaṇḍabimbam // JSudh_25 //
GK19jagsudhu:52: śuddhaṃ brahmālavālaṃ prakṛtiśabalitaṃ yasya mūlaṃ karāstaddrādhiṣṭasvarṇaśākhā vikasadaruṇimā pallavānāṃ vilāsaḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:53: nīlaṃ vyomālimālā surasaphalabharo dharmakāmārthamokṣāḥ sa śrīmānvāñchitārthaṃ vitaratu satataṃ sūryakalpadrumo vaḥ // JSudh_26 //
GK19jagsudhu:54: nīhāraṃ nimnagābhyo nikhilanayanato nīrajebhyaśca nidrāṃ nīḍebhyo nīḍajānāṃ nikaramuṣasi ye nityamudvāsayanti /
GK19jagsudhu:55: sāyaṃ teṣveva teṣāṃ punarapi ghṛṇayā kalpayante ca vāsaṃ te vaḥ santu prayāsaṃ ghṛṇighanaghṛṇayo hantumābaddhakakṣāḥ // JSudh_27 //
GK19jagsudhu:56: saṃhṛtya drāgbahiḥsthaṃ timirakulamathābhyantaraṃ hartukāmā randhrālībhirgṛhāṇāmudaramanudinaṃ ye viśaṅkaṃ viśanti /
GK19jagsudhu:57: bhānoste 'mī hṛṣīkāṇyakhilatanubhṛtāṃ harṣayanto hitehā hṛdrogaṃ saṃharantāṃ himamahimahṛto hemahṛdyāḥ karā naḥ // JSudh_28 //
GK19jagsudhu:58: brahmāṇḍaṃ maṇḍayanto viyati valayino maṇḍalairaṇḍajānāṃ pākhaṇḍāndaṇḍayanto danutanujanuṣāṃ śobhitākhaṇḍālāśāḥ /
GK19jagsudhu:59: ye khaṇḍānpauṇḍarīkānvidalayitumathoddaṇḍapāṇḍityabhājaste caṇḍāṃśoracaṇḍāstvaritamiha karāḥ pāṇḍutāṃ khaṇḍayantu // JSudh_29 //
GK19jagsudhu:60: ūrdhvaṃ pāpāvalibhyaḥ sthita iti jagade yasya vedairudākhyā ninyuḥ ke 'pyāsanārthaṃ khalu sahacaratāṃ netrayoḥ puṇḍarīkam /
GK19jagsudhu:61: oṣṭhāvṛksāma yasya drutakanakanibhaśmaśrukeśākhilāṅgaḥ so 'yaṃ sarvāntarātmā tava diśatutarāṃ vāsareśaḥ śivāni // JSudh_30 //
